title: Core Instructional Design Strategies for Strengthening Remote Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic remote education concepts
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based learning platforms for environments with limited real-time interaction

learning_goals: Explain the five core roles of remote educators (content development, technology utilization, learner support, assessment design, community-based management)
Propose three or more technical/pedagogical considerations when designing mobile-friendly remote classes
The process of analyzing survey results and establishing a faculty competency development plan can be performed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
